name: 陳殿榮
objective: This course introduces some electronic devices and their applications including diodes, bipolar junction transistors and operational amplifiers.
schedule:
1. Characteristics of a Diode and its Models
2. Zenor Diode and its Applications
3. Rectifier Circuits
4. Limiting and Clamping Circuits
5. Physical Operation of Diodes
6. Bipolar Junction Transistor (BJT):
Device Structure and I-V Characteristics
7. DC Biasing in BJT Amplifier Circuits
8. Small-Signal Operation and Models
9. Single-Stage BJT Amplifiers
10.BJT Internal Capacitances and High-Frequency Model
11.Frequency Response
12.Operational Amplifiers
scorePolicy:
Attendance and classwork 30%
Homework 30%
Midterm and Final exam 40%
materials:
Microelectronics Circuits
by Adel S. Sedra/Kenneth C. Smith
